movies.title: The Butler
movies.plot: A look at the life of Cecil Gaines who served eight presidents as the White House's head butler from 1952 to 1986, and had a unique front-row seat as political and racial history was made.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 17 wins & 51 nominations.

events.title: Cecil Gaines and his wife are guests at a State Dinner in the White House
